job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are creating a better everyday life for the modern lives of the many people, and we need your help to do it! Our team is building a new Machine Learning Platform to help Improve Time to Market for AI/ML models, Enable a platform for Standardization & Compliance. Enable Infrastructure for Auditability by Design, Platforming for Scale & Optimization. We are in the early phases of establishing the products with an ever evolving landscape with the advent of Generative AI.

   So, if you would like to get in on the ground floor of a fantastic journey to help our co-workers, this is the team to join!

   What you'll need to know

   "At IKEA, you're welcome no matter where you come from, what you believe, and what you look like. We don't even care how you have furnished your home. We're interested in you simply because you're you. Our different views, backgrounds, and personalities make us better understand our customers, give us more fun at work and spark more and better ideas. Perhaps your unique take on something could lead to a great idea that creates a better everyday life for the many people.

   We are looking for an engineer that enjoys building things that make an impact with our customers. Are you excited about technology and want a chance to be part of building better digital products for our customers? Look no further, you have arrived at the right opportunity!

   Our teams come from diverse backgrounds, coming together in the mission of creating a better everyday life for the many people over several touchpoints for the customers. In a true cross functional team with designers, data analysts, engineers, agile coach, and product owner we make this a reality.

   We expect all team members to contribute to good software design principles and keep each other accountable for the principles decided upon in the team. We use these principles to guide the team when looking for new solutions to problems, such as bringing in new tools, frameworks or creating new solutions.

   You relish the opportunity to contribute to the team's internal metrics and the product metrics. You would be part of defining how and what we measure to define success from an engineering perspective.

   Specifically, we are looking for an engineer with experience in building platforms at scale, well versed in - Machine Learning, DevOps and backend!

   A Day In Your Life With Us

   As Software Engineer, your main responsibilities will include:
     * Building software that meets the team's & company's engineering standards.
     * Contribute to all aspects of the platform lifecycle, with a focus on engineering (including new product ideas).
     * Lead and promote good software engineering practices within an agile/iterative development approach to improve time to market and fulfill business needs.
     * Partner closely with engineering manager. Onboard, coach and mentor engineers in order to secure transfer of competence and a high performing team.
     * Design and educate other engineers in ways of working, encouraging good practices to meet consumer expectations on Product or Service delivery.
     * Define solution architecture and contribute to the landscape architecture.
     * Define, maintain, and improve our integration and delivery pipeline.
     * Explore and apply new technologies suitable for our product.
     * Take responsibility for the product, all the way from ideation to runtime, this may include on call duties.
     * Continuously nurture skills towards areas such as system architecture, infrastructure management, software development and platform engineering.

   What you'll need to have

   Being a greenfield space, you will get to influence the technology landscape in the team. The technology considerations could include (but is not limited to), tech stack used by our sister teams such as:
     * Develop tools, frameworks and custom components to address common needs in machine learning platforms, such as model training, model deployments, model observability, versioning, explain ability, feature store, security, infrastructure etc.
     * Design, Develop, and maintain large scale data and cloud infrastructure required for machine learning projects.
     * Working with CI/CD flow where we strive for total automation of bringing code from a developer to production.
     * Utilize software engineering to create efficient, scalable solutions for deployment in critical production environments hosted on GCP.
     * Understanding of Large Language Models.
     * Leverage your expertise in working with GCP and Vertex AI as a foundation for scaling AI and ML solutions.
job_details.full_text:
Software engineer - machine learning operations

We are creating a better everyday life for the modern lives of the many people, and we need your help to do it! Our team is building a new Machine Learning Platform to help Improve Time to Market for AI/ML models, Enable a platform for Standardization & Compliance. Enable Infrastructure for Auditability by Design, Platforming for Scale & Optimization. We are in the early phases of establishing the products with an ever evolving landscape with the advent of Generative AI.

   So, if you would like to get in on the ground floor of a fantastic journey to help our co-workers, this is the team to join!

   What you'll need to know

   "At IKEA, you're welcome no matter where you come from, what you believe, and what you look like. We don't even care how you have furnished your home. We're interested in you simply because you're you. Our different views, backgrounds, and personalities make us better understand our customers, give us more fun at work and spark more and better ideas. Perhaps your unique take on something could lead to a great idea that creates a better everyday life for the many people.

   We are looking for an engineer that enjoys building things that make an impact with our customers. Are you excited about technology and want a chance to be part of building better digital products for our customers? Look no further, you have arrived at the right opportunity!

   Our teams come from diverse backgrounds, coming together in the mission of creating a better everyday life for the many people over several touchpoints for the customers. In a true cross functional team with designers, data analysts, engineers, agile coach, and product owner we make this a reality.

   We expect all team members to contribute to good software design principles and keep each other accountable for the principles decided upon in the team. We use these principles to guide the team when looking for new solutions to problems, such as bringing in new tools, frameworks or creating new solutions.

   You relish the opportunity to contribute to the team's internal metrics and the product metrics. You would be part of defining how and what we measure to define success from an engineering perspective.

   Specifically, we are looking for an engineer with experience in building platforms at scale, well versed in - Machine Learning, DevOps and backend!

   A Day In Your Life With Us

   As Software Engineer, your main responsibilities will include:
     * Building software that meets the team's & company's engineering standards.
     * Contribute to all aspects of the platform lifecycle, with a focus on engineering (including new product ideas).
     * Lead and promote good software engineering practices within an agile/iterative development approach to improve time to market and fulfill business needs.
     * Partner closely with engineering manager. Onboard, coach and mentor engineers in order to secure transfer of competence and a high performing team.
     * Design and educate other engineers in ways of working, encouraging good practices to meet consumer expectations on Product or Service delivery.
     * Define solution architecture and contribute to the landscape architecture.
     * Define, maintain, and improve our integration and delivery pipeline.
     * Explore and apply new technologies suitable for our product.
     * Take responsibility for the product, all the way from ideation to runtime, this may include on call duties.
     * Continuously nurture skills towards areas such as system architecture, infrastructure management, software development and platform engineering.

   What you'll need to have

   Being a greenfield space, you will get to influence the technology landscape in the team. The technology considerations could include (but is not limited to), tech stack used by our sister teams such as:
     * Develop tools, frameworks and custom components to address common needs in machine learning platforms, such as model training, model deployments, model observability, versioning, explain ability, feature store, security, infrastructure etc.
     * Design, Develop, and maintain large scale data and cloud infrastructure required for machine learning projects.
     * Working with CI/CD flow where we strive for total automation of bringing code from a developer to production.
     * Utilize software engineering to create efficient, scalable solutions for deployment in critical production environments hosted on GCP.
     * Understanding of Large Language Models.
     * Leverage your expertise in working with GCP and Vertex AI as a foundation for scaling AI and ML solutions.

job_profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building and maintaining a Machine Learning Platform focused on improving time to market, standardization, compliance, and auditability for AI/ML models. While Generative AI is mentioned, the core responsibilities and technologies align more closely with MLOps and the productionization of ML models rather than the development of GenAI applications themselves.

phrases.phrase: creating a better everyday life for the modern lives of the many people
phrases.justification: This phrase indicates the overarching goal and purpose of the team's work, aligning technical efforts with business objectives.

phrases.phrase: Improve Time to Market for AI/ML models
phrases.justification: This directly states a business need that the ML platform aims to address, focusing on efficiency and speed in delivering AI/ML solutions.

phrases.phrase: Enable a platform for Standardization & Compliance
phrases.justification: This highlights the business requirement for regulated and consistent AI/ML model development and deployment.

phrases.phrase: Enable Infrastructure for Auditability by Design
phrases.justification: This points to a business need for transparency and traceability in the ML lifecycle, crucial for compliance and trust.

phrases.phrase: Platforming for Scale & Optimization
phrases.justification: This indicates a business driver for efficient and robust infrastructure to support growing AI/ML initiatives.

phrases.phrase: fulfill business needs
phrases.justification: This explicitly links the engineering work to meeting the requirements of the business.

phrases.phrase: define how and what we measure to define success from an engineering perspective
phrases.justification: This involves understanding business success metrics and translating them into engineering goals and measurements.

phrases.phrase: feature store
phrases.justification: A feature store is a core component of data engineering for ML, managing and serving features for model training and inference.

phrases.phrase: Design, Develop, and maintain large scale data and cloud infrastructure required for machine learning projects
phrases.justification: This directly describes the responsibilities related to building and managing the data infrastructure necessary for ML.

phrases.phrase: Machine Learning
phrases.justification: This is a broad term indicating the core domain of work, which involves creating and managing ML models.

phrases.phrase: model training
phrases.justification: This is a fundamental step in the ML lifecycle, directly related to building and adapting models.

phrases.phrase: model deployments
phrases.justification: This involves putting trained models into production, a key aspect of the modeling lifecycle.

phrases.phrase: model observability
phrases.justification: Monitoring and understanding model performance in production is a critical part of the modeling process.

phrases.phrase: versioning
phrases.justification: Managing different versions of models is essential for reproducibility and rollback, a modeling task.

phrases.phrase: explain ability
phrases.justification: Ensuring models can be explained is a requirement often tied to the modeling process and its outputs.

phrases.phrase: Understanding of Large Language Models
phrases.justification: This indicates familiarity with a specific type of generative model, relevant to the modeling aspect.

phrases.phrase: scaling AI and ML solutions
phrases.justification: This implies working with and optimizing the performance of AI and ML models.

phrases.phrase: Software engineer - machine learning operations
phrases.justification: The title itself indicates a software engineering role focused on ML operations.

phrases.phrase: building a new Machine Learning Platform
phrases.justification: This involves the development of a software platform to support ML workflows.

phrases.phrase: Building software that meets the team's & company's engineering standards
phrases.justification: This is a core software development responsibility, ensuring code quality and adherence to standards.

phrases.phrase: Contribute to all aspects of the platform lifecycle, with a focus on engineering
phrases.justification: This highlights the role in developing and maintaining the software platform.

phrases.phrase: Lead and promote good software engineering practices
phrases.justification: This emphasizes the application of software development principles.

phrases.phrase: Define solution architecture and contribute to the landscape architecture
phrases.justification: This involves designing the structure and components of software systems.

phrases.phrase: Explore and apply new technologies suitable for our product
phrases.justification: This involves researching and integrating new software technologies.

phrases.phrase: Continuously nurture skills towards areas such as system architecture, infrastructure management, software development and platform engineering
phrases.justification: This explicitly mentions software development as a key skill area.

phrases.phrase: Develop tools, frameworks and custom components to address common needs in machine learning platforms
phrases.justification: This describes the creation of software components for the ML platform.

phrases.phrase: Utilize software engineering to create efficient, scalable solutions for deployment in critical production environments
phrases.justification: This directly states the application of software engineering for building production-ready solutions.

phrases.phrase: machine learning operations
phrases.justification: This is the core definition of MLOps, focusing on the operational aspects of ML.

phrases.phrase: Improve Time to Market for AI/ML models
phrases.justification: MLOps aims to streamline the deployment and operationalization of models, impacting time to market.

phrases.phrase: Enable a platform for Standardization & Compliance
phrases.justification: MLOps practices ensure models are deployed and managed in a standardized and compliant manner.

phrases.phrase: Enable Infrastructure for Auditability by Design
phrases.justification: MLOps includes setting up systems for tracking and auditing model behavior in production.

phrases.phrase: Platforming for Scale & Optimization
phrases.justification: MLOps is crucial for scaling ML systems and optimizing their performance in production.

phrases.phrase: DevOps
phrases.justification: This is a direct mention of the operational discipline that MLOps is based on.

phrases.phrase: Define, maintain, and improve our integration and delivery pipeline
phrases.justification: This is a key MLOps responsibility, focusing on CI/CD for ML models.

phrases.phrase: Working with CI/CD flow where we strive for total automation of bringing code from a developer to production
phrases.justification: This describes the automation of the deployment pipeline, a central MLOps tenet.

phrases.phrase: deployment in critical production environments
phrases.justification: This highlights the focus on operationalizing solutions in live environments.

phrases.phrase: Take responsibility for the product, all the way from ideation to runtime, this may include on call duties
phrases.justification: This encompasses the full lifecycle management of a product, including its operational runtime and support.

phrases.phrase: infrastructure management
phrases.justification: This is a key component of MLOps, dealing with the underlying systems for ML deployment.
